forum.latestCommentText: a new quik card with a style akin to the original.

thread.title: onto marker for train station

comments.text: hi fazzi! would it be possible to add a marker thing at the ground just next to the fazzi's home station tracks (near the artmat) with a unique name? i'm in need of something for→
→a bar whirl exit door to there (it goes via art train and should feel like one then exits the train there).
side note: do you still plan on renaming fazzi's home or will it likely remain with this name? (asking as it makes a great exit target area, so the name might be used in scripts)
hey! i've moved "artmat" over a bit so it makes sense as a train exit. i probably won't rename my home, so you can link to it :)

thread.latestCommentText: hey! i've moved "artmat" over a bit so it makes sense as a train exit. i probably won't rename my home, so you can link to it :)
